name: Desmidice
description:
Controls:

  • Left Mouse Button: Grab/Release dice
  • Right Mouse Button: Rotate dice
  • A/D or arrows: Rotate camera
  • Scrollwheel to zoom

Desmidice is about guiding lasers throughout the board with dice.

If a laser gets redirected, the value of the face it hits is added to the laser.

You must connect all receivers with the correct value to complete the level.

The game contains 8 levels, each increasing in difficulty.

You can always skip a level and go to the next one from the main menu.

Name:

Desmi - greek for beam
